JoingroupAction

Join a group

This is the action for joining a group.  It works more or less like the subscribe action for users.

Variables

  • group: group being joined
Summary
preparePrepare to run
handleHandle the request

prepare

protected function prepare(array $args = array())

Prepare to run

Error states

  • returns a client error if not logged in
  • returns a client error if the group does not exist
  • returns a client error if the group id or name is not provided
  • returns a client error if the user has been blocked

Returns

  • boolean true if successful

handle

protected function handle()

Handle the request

On POST, add the current user to the group

Returns

  • void
protected function prepare(array $args = array())
Prepare to run
protected function handle()
Handle the request
